attributes.action: make sure that elderly people in all care homes are covered by Human Rights legislation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After watching "Panorama" I was shocked to note that elderly people who are resident in care homes are not covered by Human Rights legislation. This is  a disgusting state of affairs, where the elderly are treated worse than dogs. Dogs, it seems, have got rights, but the elderly, who are resident in care homes, have no rights to protection from abuse  at all.
